W08_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W08_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: Cordycep: The World inside a Hole

W08_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After passing through the door, you find yourself in a narrow underground space. Even a place like this could have information about your heart, so start digging!

W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_040_DETAIL.text: There is a 95 percent chance the Lord of the Earth is heading for the Bashar colony.

W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_040_DETAIL.text: There is a 95 percent chance the Lord of the Earth is heading for the Naml colony.

W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_040_DETAIL.text: There is a 95 percent chance the Lord of the Earth is heading for the Dufda colony.

W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_040_DETAIL.text: The Lord of the Earth's final destination is the Kuld colony.

W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_045_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_MOLE_045_DETAIL.text: There is a 30 percent chance the Lord of the Earth is heading for the Kuld colony.

W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_045_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_HUMAN_045_DETAIL.text: There is a 30 percent chance the Lord of the Earth is heading for the Bashar colony.

W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_045_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_INSECT_045_DETAIL.text: There is a 30 percent chance the Lord of the Earth is heading for the Naml colony.

W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_045_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W08_EVAR_DIVA_BURROW_FROG_045_DETAIL.text: There is a 30 percent chance the Lord of the Earth is heading for the Dufda colony.
